spells.html_content:
Spells

Madoll
/ Transmuted Madoll
1 - 3 Range / 3AP

Summons a biddable Madoll that removes AP from enemies and applies the Infected state on them.

If an Infected enemy is targeted by one of the Sadida's single-target spells (excluding Paralysing Poison): all Infected enemies are affected by the spell.

The effects applied on secondary Infected enemies do not take into account critical hits and can be triggered 3 times per turn.
Required level: :
1|68|134

Normal effects

Summons

Critical effects

No effect for this spell

Other characteristics

Recast interval
4
Modifiable range
No
Line of sight
Yes
Cast in a straight line only
No
Target necessary
No

spells.html_content:

Sylvan Power
/ Vegetal Influence
1 - 63 Range / 2AP

Replaces one of the caster's Leafy Trees with a controllable Tree that can:
• Push a target.
• Shorten the length of effects on a target.
• Heal allies in an area of effect.

At the end of its turn, it becomes a Puny Tree again.

spells.html_content:
Spells

Sacrificial Doll
/ Transmuted Sacrificed
1 - 3 Range / 3AP

Summons a biddable Sacrificial Doll that applies the Infected state and inflicts Water damage as it dies.
It also applies the Infected state on all enemies adjacent to the caster's Leafy Trees.

For each turn that the Sacrificial Doll remains alive, its Vitality and final damage inflicted increase.
Required level: :

spells.html_content:
Spells

Dolly Sacrifice
/ Force of Nature
1 - 6 Range / 4AP

Steals HP in the Water element from allies or inflicts Water damage on enemies.

On an Infected enemy: inflicts Water damage on all Infected enemies.

On one of the caster's Dolls:
• Steals HP in the Water element and kills the Doll.
• Heals allies (except the caster) for up to 100% of the damage inflicted in a 2-cell circle around the Doll and the caster.
• Reduces the targeted Doll's cooldown period by 1 turn.
• Half of the spell's AP cost is reimbursed.
Required level: :
50|117|184

Normal effects

27 to 30 (Water steal)
27 to 30 (Water damage)
Heals 100% of damage inflicted
+2 AP

Critical effects

33 to 36 (Water steal)
33 to 36 (Water damage)
Heals 100% of damage inflicted
+2 AP

25%

2

1

No

Yes

No

Yes

spells.html_content:
Spells

Tree of Life
/ Harmony
1 - 63 Range / 2AP

Transforms one of the caster's Leafy Trees into a Tree of Life and increases its Vitality.

For 2 turns:
• Allies that attack the Tree of Life are healed by some of the damage inflicted.
• Heals the caster's Sadida summons at the end of each of the caster's turns.
• Shares damage between all of the caster's Trees (excluding Trees of Life).

The Tree of Life turns back into a Leafy Tree 2 turns after its transformation.
The effects cannot be unbewitched.
Required level: :
75|142

Normal effects

Changes appearance (2 turns)
50% Vitality (2 turns)
Heals the attacker by 100% of damage suffered
Heal: 15% of max HP (2 turns)
Damage sharing

No effect for this spell

3

No

No

No

Yes

spells.html_content:
Spells

Transmuted Sacrificed
/ Sacrificial Doll
1 - 63 Range / 2AP

Replaces one of the caster's Leafy Trees with a biddable Sacrificial Doll that dies, applying the Infected state and inflicting Water damage.
It also applies the Infected state on all enemies adjacent to the caster's Leafy Trees.

For each turn that the Sacrificial Doll remains alive, its Vitality and final damage inflicted increase.

Upon its death, the Sacrificial Doll becomes a Puny Tree again.
Required level: :
140

Normal effects

Kills the target to replace it with the Summons: 5898

spells.html_content:
Spells

Voodoo Curse
/ Bush Fire
1 - 5 Range / 3AP

Inflicts Fire and Water damage on enemies.

On the enemy for 2 turns:
• Inflicts Fire damage if they suffer an attempted MP removal.
• Inflicts Water damage if they suffer an attempted AP removal.
Each element's damage can be triggered 3 times per turn.

On an Infected enemy: applies the effects of the spell on all Infected enemies.
Required level: :
190

Normal effects

11 to 13 (Water damage)
